document_data.name: Scattercloak
document_data.mainbody: '''Scattercloak''' was a mage in [[Thentia]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{cite book/The Rite}}<ref group="note">Scattercloak's race, sex, alignment, and level are marked with question marks, suggesting they are uncertain or only estimates. They are used here for reference and organization purposes.
document_data.Description: As of {{yearlink|1373}}, Scattercloak wore always a gray mantle with the hood up.{{cite book/The Rite}}
document_data.History: Scattercloak was one of the mages in Thentia assisting [[Karasendrieth]]'s party in decoding [[Sammaster]]'s notes about the [[Rage of Dragons]] in {{yearlink|1373}}, and one of the people who helped slay [[Phourkyn One-Eye]]'s impersonator. When in that fight, he cast ''[[spellstrike]]'' to reverse the wyrm's escape.
